title: Lord Ganesha
lyrics:
Shuklam Bharadharam Vishnum
Shashi Varnam Chatur Bhujam
Prasanna Vadanam Dhyayeth
Sarva Vighnopa Shantayae
translation: Invocation to Lord Ganesha! Clad art Thou in white, with four arms, Thy colour is that of the moon and Thy face is full of joy. We worship Thee that all obstacles may be removed.

title: Guru Mantra
lyrics:
Gurur Brahma Gurur Vishnuh
Gurur Devo Maheshwara
Guru Saakshaat Param Brahma
Tasmai Shri Gurave Namah
translation: Guru is Brahma (The Lord of creation). Guru is Vishnu (The Lord of Preservation). Guru is Maheshwara (The Lord of Destruction). Guru is supreme Parabrahman himself and therefore prostration unto that Guru.

title: Gayatri Mantra
lyrics:
Aum Bhur Buvah Suvah
Tat Savitur Varenyam
Bhargo Devasya Dheemahi
Dhiyo Yo Nah Prachodayaat
translation: O God, the Source of all beings, the Dispeller of all darkness, the Bestower of peace, the Creator, Worthy of devotion, the blissful, the All-pervading, kindly enable us to meditate upon Thee! We pray to Thee to enlighten our intellect.

title: Sai Gayatri
lyrics:
Aum Sayeeshwaraya Vidhmahe
Sathya Devaaya Dheemahi
Thannah Sarva Prachodayaat
translation: May we realise Ishwara Sai, meditate on the Shining Sai and may He inspire us. May we realise Rama as Sai, meditate on Rama as Atma and may Baba inspire us.

title: Hindu Prayer
lyrics:
Twameva Mata Cha Pita Twameva
Twameva Bandhuscha Sakhaa Twameva
Twameva Vidyaa Dhravinam Twameva
Twameva Sarvamam Mama Deva Deva
translation: O Lord, you are my Mother, Father, Kinsman and Friend. You are my wealth of knowledge, strength, valour and power. You are my all, my Lord of Lords.

title: The Lord’s Prayer
lyrics:
Our Father, who art in Heaven,
hallowed be Thy name
Thy Kingdom come.
Thy will be done on Earth as it is in Heaven.
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Give us this day our daily bread and forgive us our trespasses,
as we forgive those who trespass against us.
And lead us not into temptation,
but deliver us from evil.
For Thine is the Kingdom, the Power and the Glory
For ever and ever. Amen

title: Buddhist Prayer
lyrics:
Namo Tassa Bhagavato Arahatho Samma Sambuddhassa (3)
Buddham Saranam Gacchaami
Dhammam Saranam Gacchaami
Sangham Saranam Gacchaami
translation: Salutations to the Blessed One, the Holy One, the fully Enlightened One. I take refuge in Buddha. I take refuge in the Dhamma. I take refuge in the Sangha.

title: Islam Prayer
lyrics:
Bismillahir Rahmanir Rahim
Laa Ilah Illallaha
Muhammadur Rasul Allah
Allah Ho Akbar (3)
Ameen
translation: In the name of Allah the most merciful, the most kind. There is no God but Allah. Mohammed is the Messenger of Allah.

title: Sikh Prayer
lyrics:
Ek Omkar
Sat Naam
Karta Purakh
Nirbhau Nirvair
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Akaal Moorat
Ajuni Saibhang
Gurprasad
Jap
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Aad Sach
Jugaad Sach
Haibhee Sach
Nanak Hosee Bhee Sach
translation: There is one and only one God. His name is Truth. He is the creator, without fear and without enmity. He is eternal, imperishable and is beyond birth and death. He is self-illuminated and is realised by the kindness of the true Guru. Repeat His name. Truth ever was, Truth was the beginning of the cycles of time. Truth doth remain, and Truth shall ever remain, says Guru Nanak.

title: Naamavalli (108 Names of the Lord)
lyrics:
Om Sri Bhagavan Sathya Sai Babaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sathya Swaroopaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sathyadharmaparayanaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Varadaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Sathpurushaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sathya Gunnathmane Namah
Om Sri Sai Sadhuvardhanaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sadhujana Poshanaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Sarvajnaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sarva Jana Priyaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sarva Sakthi Moothaye Namah
Om Sri Sai Sarvesaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Sarva Sanga Parithyaagine Namah
Om Sri Sai Sarva Antharyaaminae Namah
Om Sri Sai Mahimaatmane Namah
Om Sri Sai Maheswara Swaroopaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Parthi Gramodbhavaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Parthi Kshetra Nivaasine Namah
Om Sri Sai Yasahkaaya Shirdi Vaasine Namah
Om Sri Sai Jodi Aadipalli Somappaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Bharadwaja Rishi Gothraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Bhakta Vathsalaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Apaantharaathmane Namah
Om Sri Sai Avathaara Moorthaye Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Sarva Bhaya Nivaarine Namah
Om Sri Sai Aapasthamba Suthraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Abhayapradaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Ratnaakara Vamsodbhavaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Shirdi Saayi Abheda Sakthi Avthaaraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Samkaraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Shirdi Sai Moorthaye Namah
Om Sri Sai Dwaarakamaayi Vaasine Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Chitraavathee Thata Puttaparthi Vihaarine Namah
Om Sri Sai Sakthi Pradaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Saranaagatha Thraanaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Anandaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Aananda Daaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Aartha Thraana Paraayanaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Anaatha Naathaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Asahaaya Sahaayaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Loka Baandhavaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Lokarakshaa Paraayanaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Lokanaathaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Deenajana Poshanaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Moorthi Thraya Swaroopaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Mukthi Pradaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Kalusha Vidooraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Karunaakaraaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Sarvaadhaaraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sarva Hrudayavasine Namah
Om Sri Sai Punya Phala Pradaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sarva Paapakshaya Karaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Sarva Roga Nivaarine Namah
Om Sri Sai Sarva Baadha Haraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Anantha Nutha Karthrune Namah
Om Sri Sai Aadi Purushaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Aadi Sakthaye Namah
Om Sri Sai Aparoopa Sakthine Namah
Om Sri Sai Avyaktha Roopine Namah
Om Sri Sai Kaamakrodha Dhwamsine Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Kanakaambara Dhaarine Namah
Om Sri Sai Adbhutha Charyaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Aapadbaandhavaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Premaatmane Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Prema Moorthaye Namah
Om Sri Sai Prema Pradaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Priyaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Bhakta Priyaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Bhaktha Mandaaraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Bhaktha Jana Hridaya Vihaaraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Bhakthajana Hrudayaalayaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Bhaktha Paraadheenaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Bhakthi Jnana Pradeepaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Bhakthi Jnana Pradaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sujnaana Maargadarsakaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Jnaanaswarupaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Gita Bodhakaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Jnana Siddhidaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sundararupaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Punya Purushaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Phalapradaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Purushothamaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Puraana Purushaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Atheethaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Kaalaatheethaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Siddhiroopaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Siddha Sankalpaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Aarogya Pradaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Annavastradaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Samsaara Dukhashayakaraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sarvaabheesta Pradaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Kalyaanagunaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Karmadhwamsine Namah
Om Sri Sai Saadhu Maanasa Sobhithaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sarvamatha Sammathaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Saadhumaanasa Parisodhakaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Sadhakaanugraha Vata Vriksha Prathisthaapakaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sakala Samsaya Haraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sakalathathwa Bodhakaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Yogiswaraaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Yogindra Vandithaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sarva Mangala Kaaraaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Sarva Siddhi Pradaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Aapannivarine Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Sri Sai Aarthiharaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Saantha Moorthaye Namah
Om Sri Sai Sulabha Prasannaaya Namah
Om Sri Sai Bhagavan Sri Sathya Sai Babaaya Namah
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Shanthi Shanthi Shanthi

title: Universal Prayer
lyrics:
Asato Maa Sad Gamaya
Tamaso Maa Jyotir Gamaya
Mrityor Maa Amirtham Gamaya.
Om Shanthi Shanthi Shanthi
translation: O Lord! Lead me from the unreal to the real. Lead me from darkness lead me to light. Lead me from death to immortality. Let there be peace peace peace.

title: Mantra Pushpam
lyrics:
Yopam puspam veda
Puspavan prajavan pasuvan bhavati
Candramava Apam puspam
Puspavan, Prajavan pasuman bhavati
Ya Evam Veda
Yopa mayatanam Veda
Ayatanam bhavati
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Agnirva Apamayatanam
Ayatanavan Bhavati
Yo gnerayatanam Veda
Ayatanavan bhavati
Apovagner ayatanam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Ya Evam Veda
Yopa mayatanam Veda
Ayatanavan bhavati
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Vayurva Apamaya tanam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Yova Yorayatanam Veda
Ayatanavan bhavati
Apovai va yorayatanam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Ya Evam veda
Yopamayatanam Veda
Ayatanavan Bhavati
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Asowvai tapanna pamayatanam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Yo musya tapata Ayatanan Veda
Ayatanavan bhavati
Apova Amusyatapata Ayatanam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Ya Evam Veda
Yopa mayatanam Veda
Ayatanavan bhavati
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Candrama Vama pamayatnam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Yascandra masa Ayatanam Veda
Ayatanavan bhavati
Apovai Candra masa Ayatanam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Ya Evam Veda
Yo pamayatanam veda
Ayatanavan bhavati
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Nakshtrani va Apamayatanam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Yo Nakshtrana mayatanam Veda
Ayatanavan bhavati
Apovai Nakshtrana mayatanam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Ye evam Veda
Yopamaya tanam Veda
Ayatanavan bhavati
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Parjanyova apamayatanam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Yah parjanyasya syayatinam Veda
Ayatanavan bhavati
Apovai parjanya Syayatanam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Ye Evam veda
Yopa maya tanam Veda
Ayatanavan bhavati
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Samvastaro Va Apamayatanam
Ayatavan bhavati
Yassavatsa rasyaya tanam Veda
Ayatavan bhavati
Apovai samvasara ayatanam
Ayatanavan bhavati
Ya Evam veda
Yopsu Navam pratistitam veda
Pratyeva tistati
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Rajadhi rajaya Prasahya Sahine
Namo Vayam Vai Sravanaya Kurmahe
Samekaman Kama Kamaya mahyam
Kamesvaro Vai Sravano dadatu
Kuberaya Vai Sravanaya
Maha rajaya Namah.

title: Sarva Dharma Prayer
lyrics:
Aum Tat Sat Sri Narayana Tu
Purushotthama Guru Tu
Siddha Buddha Tu, Skanda Vinaayaka
Savitha Paavaka Tu (2)
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Brahma Mazda Tu, Yahva Shakthi Tu, Esu Pitha Prabhu Tu
Rudhra Vishnu Tu, Ramakrishna Tu
Rahim Tao Tu (2)
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Vasudeva Go Viswaroopa Tu
Chidaananda Hari Tu
Advitheeya Tu, Akaala Nirbhaya
Aatmalinga Shiva Tu (3)

title: Mangala Aarthi
lyrics:
Aum Jaya Jagadheesa Harey
Swami Sathya Sai Harey
Bhaktha Jana Samrakshaka
Bhaktha Jana Samrakshaka
Parthi Maheshwara
Om Jaya Jagadheesa Harey
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Sashi Vadhana Sree Karaa
Sarva Praana Pathey
Swami Sarva Praana Pathey
Aasritha Kalpalatheeka
Aasritha Kalpalatheeka
Aapadh Baandhavaa
Om Jaya Jagadheesa Harey
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Maatha Pitha Guru Dhaivamu
Mari Anthayu Neevey
Swami Mari Anthayu Neevey
Naadha Brahma Jagan Naatha
Naadha Brahma Jagan Naatha
Naagendra Shayanaa
Om Jaya Jagadheesa Harey
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Omkaara Roopa Ojaswi
Om Saayi Mahadeva
Sathya Saayi Mahadeva
Mangala Aarathi Anduko
Mangala Aarathi Anduko
Mandhara Giridhari
Om Jaya Jagadheesa Harey
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Narayana Narayana
Om Sathya Narayana
Narayana Narayana Aum
Narayana Narayana Aum Sathya
Narayana Narayana Aum
Sathya Narayana Narayana Aum
Om Jai Sadguru Devaa
[[PAGE_BREAK]]
Om Shanthi Shanthi Shanthi
JAI BOLO BHAGAWAN SRI SATHYA SAI BABAJI KI JAI

title: Vibhuti Mantra
lyrics:
Paramam Pavithram Baba Vibhuthim
Paramam Vichithram Leela Vibhuthim
Paramartha Ishtartha Moksha Pradaanam
Baba Vibhuthim Idam Asrayaami
(Sacred Holy and Supreme is Baba’s Vibhuti. Pouring Forth in Sacred Stream, This Play of Vibhuti. So Auspicious is its Might it grants Liberation. Baba’s Vibhuti – its Power protects me)

title: Guru Prayer (Mangalam)
lyrics:
Mangalam Gurudevaya
Mangalam Jnanadaayiney
Mangalam Parthivaasaaya
Mangalam Sathya Saayeeney
Om Shanthi Shanthi Shanthi
(May the Divine Guru be auspicious to us. May the bestower of wisdom be auspicious to us. May the Lord, who manifested in Parthi be auspicious to us. May Bhagawan Sathya Sai Baba be auspicious to us.)

title: Peace Prayer
lyrics:
Samasta Loka Sukino Bhavantu
Samasta Loka Sukino Bhavantu
Samasta Loka Sukino Bhavantu
(May the citizens of the world have peace and happiness.)

title: Silent Meditation (3 minutes)
lyrics:
Silent Meditation (3 minutes)
(Close the eyes, observe the breath, rest in silence.)

title: Food Prayer (Brahmarpanam)
lyrics:
Brahmarpanam Brahma Havir Brahmagnau Brahmanahutaṃ
Brahmaiva Tena Gantavyam Brahmakarma Samadhinah
Aham Vaishvanaro Bhutva Praninam Dehamashritaha
Pranapana Samayuktah Pachamyannam Chaturvidham
translation: The food thus offered to God is digested by 'Vaishwanara' in the digestive system. Since God exists in the form of fire as Vaishwanara, He digests the food along with the impurities. So, man will not be affected even if the impurities enter the food.
